Name: Leshrac
Bio: Leshrac, Tormented Soul, is an entity torn from the heart of nature, a liminal being that exists half in one plane of existence, half in another. His penetrating intelligence is such that he can never ignore for a moment the agonizing horror at the heart of all creation. Once a great philosopher who sought the meaning of existence, he plumbed the depths of nature with the haunted Chronoptic Crystals, and was forever altered by the hideous mysteries thereby revealed to him. Now the darkest depths of his enlightenment are illumined only by the fitful glare of his arrogance. Like other elemental characters, he is completely at one with nature, but in his case it is a nature lurid and vile. He alone sees the evil truth of reality, and has no use for those who believe the cosmos reserves a special reward for those who practice benevolence.

Abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
Abilities.desc: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.
Abilities.notes:
Split Earth will destroy trees in its area of effect.
There is a 0.35 second delay before the effect is applied.
Abilities.lore: Twisting nature to his vile will, the shifting earth consumes those unlucky enough to cross Leshrac's path.

Abilities.affects:
ABILITY: No Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Physical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
Abilities.desc: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal physical damage to enemy units and structures.  The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take.  Deals 40% more damage to towers.  Lasts 10 seconds.
Abilities.notes:
Damage is not reduced by damage block.
The explosions will continue even if Leshrac is killed.
Can damage buildings, Spell Immune units, and invisible units.
Abilities.lore: Chronoptic energy bursts from one plane to the other, evaporating anything it touches.

Abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
Abilities.desc:
Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then strikes any nearby enemy units. Struck enemies are slowed.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
Abilities.attribute:
LIGHTNING STRIKES: 4 / 6 / 8 / 10
LIGHTNING JUMP RADIUS: 475
MOVEMENT SLOW: 75%
SCEPTER INTERVAL: 1.75
SCEPTER RADIUS: 750
Abilities.lore: The Tormented Soul's mastery of the elements is evident in the massive storms that strike down armies before him.

Abilities.affects:
ABILITY: No Target, Toggle
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
Abilities.desc: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units.
Abilities.attribute:
MANA/SEC: 20 / 40 / 60
RADIUS: 450
DAMAGE: 100 / 140 / 180
SCEPTER UPGRADE: While Pulse Nova is active, Lightning Storm will hit one random unit in a radius every 1.75 seconds.
Abilities.lore: If necessary, the Tormented Soul can manipulate space time itself, ravaging lesser beings.
